content.html: The best advice I can give folks about maintaining your own web site. First, it should be a living thing showing off all your works. chrisshort.net is way more than a blog. I treat like a time capsule that I continuously add to.
content.value: The best advice I can give folks about maintaining your own web site. First, it should be a living thing showing off all your works. chrisshort.net is way more than a blog. I treat like a time capsule that I continuously add to.
